<script>
  (function(){
    const VERSION = '2025-08-28-v4'; // æ›´æ–°æ–‡æ¡ˆæ—¶æ”¹è¿™ä¸ª
    const KEY = 'announce:dismissed';
    const bar = document.getElementById('announce');
    const toggle = document.getElementById('ann-toggle');

    // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ˜¾ç¤ºé€»è¾‘
    try {
      const dismissed = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
      if (dismissed !== VERSION) {
        bar.hidden = false; toggle.hidden = true;
      } else {
        bar.hidden = true; toggle.hidden = false;
      }
    } catch(_) { bar.hidden = false; }

    // å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶
    bar.querySelector('.ann-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = true;
      toggle.hidden = false;
      try { localStorage.setItem(KEY, VERSION); } catch(_) {}
    });

    // æ‰“å¼€äº‹ä»¶
    toggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = false;
      toggle.hidden = true;
      try { localStorage.removeItem(KEY); } catch(_) {}
    });
  })();
</script>
